titles.title: Nonprofit Security Expansion Act
Nonprofit Security Expansion Act
To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to increase the authorization of appropriations for the Nonprofit Security Grant Program of the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Emergency Preparedness, Response, and Recovery.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Nonprofit Security Expansion Act
This bill increases the authorization of appropriations for the Nonprofit Security Grant Program of the Department of Homeland Security.
